00066    /*
00067    * Read a C array parameter.
00068    */
00069    template <class Type>
00070    void CArrayParam<Type>::readParam(std::istream &in)
00071    {
00072       if (isParamIoProcessor()) {
00073          in >> label_;
00074          in >> value_[0];
00075          for (int i = 1; i < n_; ++i) {
00076             in >> value_[i];
00077          }
00078          if (ParamComponent::echo()) {
00079             writeParam(Log::file());
00080          }
00081       }
00082       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00083          if (hasParamCommunicator()) 
00084             bcast<Type>(paramCommunicator(), value_, n_, 0); 
00085       #endif
00086    }
00087 
00088    /*
00089    * Write a C array
00090    */
00091    template <class Type>
00092    void CArrayParam<Type>::writeParam(std::ostream &out) 
00093    {
00094 
00095       #if 0
00096       // Output label
00097       out << indent();
00098       out << label_;
00099 
00100       // Output values
00101       for (int i = 0; i < n_; ++i) {
00102          out.setf(std::ios::scientific);
00103          out.width(Parameter::Width);
00104          out.precision(Parameter::Precision);
00105          out << value_[i];
00106       }
00107       out << std::endl;
00108       #endif
00109 
00110       Label space("");
00111       for (int i = 0; i < n_; ++i) {
00112          if (i == 0) {
00113             out << indent() << label_;
00114          } else {
00115             out << indent() << space;
00116          }
00117          out << std::right << std::scientific 
00118              << std::setprecision(Parameter::Precision) 
00119              << std::setw(Parameter::Width)
00120              << value_[i] 
00121              << std::endl;
00122       }
00123 
00124    }
